1.Title: Easy Strides
1.Description: When launching a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, the equipper gains 1 stack of a buff effect. Each stack increases the equipper's Sheer Force by <color=#2BAD00>80</color>, stacking up to 3 times, and lasting 12s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
